thread.title: Iggy Azalea slams Rita Ora's idea of remaking 'Lady Marmalade'
thread.title_full: Iggy Azalea slams Rita Ora's idea of remaking 'Lady Marmalade' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Iggy Azalea slams Rita Ora's idea of remaking 'Lady Marmalade'
text:
*London:* Rapper Iggy Azalea says she doesn't want to be involved in singer Rita Ora 's planned remake of the popular number ' Lady Marmalade '.
*Iggy Azalea and Rita Ora. Pic/Santa Banta*
The rapper has blasted 'The X Factor' judge's idea of reworking on Labelle's 1975 classic hit - which was later covered by Christina ... Â»
